Package org.moddingx.libx.datagen.provider.loot.entry

Interface GenericLootModifier<T>

All Superinterfaces:
LootFactory<T>
All Known Subinterfaces:
LootModifier<T>
public interface GenericLootModifier<T> extends LootFactory<T>
Interface to modify a singleton loot entry to a new loot entry. This can also be used as a LootFactory in which case the default item entry obtained from is passed to the apply method.
